participant_1.background:
I listen to audiobooks and podcasts to educate myself and pass the time.
My first purchase was a bike, so I could enjoy the woods on my own terms.
i keep my hair cut very short.
i m looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
i like italian cousine.

participant_2.background:
I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet.
My wedding planning business took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city.
i secretly love watching we wrestling.
I love my mom's home cooked meals.
i spend most of my days working at my churchs food pantry.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing this evening?
Hey, good! I'm actually pretty tired, but I'm getting used to it.
What are you tired from?
I have been working a lot lately. I started my own wedding planning business and it's been taking off!
Oh, that's awesome! How did that happen?
Well, I've always been really good at organizing and planning things, so I thought I'd give it a shot.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're great at it.
Thanks! I'm trying my best.
Do you work from home or do you have an office?
I have an office. I actually had my home featured in a magazine for being one of the cleanest in the city!
Wow, that's really impressive! I bet you're a great host.
I try my best! I love having people over.
What do you like to cook for people?
I love to cook Italian food. My mom is an amazing cook, so I learned a lot from her.
I love Italian food! That's my favorite.
Really? Mine too! What's your favorite Italian food?
I love lasagna. It's my favorite.
Me too! I love making lasagna. It's so easy and it's always a hit.
It is really easy to make! I love that about it.
Me too! I love making it for parties.
Me too! It's always a crowd pleaser.
I love it! It's my favorite food.
